title: CHAPTER I. INTRODUCING TOM, THE BOOTBLACK.

book.title: Tom, The Bootblack or, The Road to Success
book.description: 简介： How do you feel this morning, Jacob? asked a boy of fifteen, bending over an old man crouched in the corner of an upper room, in a poor tenement-house, distant less than a quarter of a mile from the New York City Hall....
